aspirin.name: Aspirin
aspirin.description: Aspirin can cause developmental toxicity and female reproductive toxicity according to an independent committee of scientific and health experts.

benzoic acid.name: Benzoic Acid
benzoic acid.description: Benzoic acid appears as a white crystalline solid. Slightly soluble in water. The primary hazard is the potential for environmental damage if released. Immediate steps should be taken to limit spread to the environment. Used to make other chemicals, as a food preservative, and for other uses.
